text: Jack and His Friends is a 1992 American comedy film written and directed by Bruce Ornstein and starring Allen Garfield, Judy Reyes and Sam Rockwell. ==Plot== ==Cast== *Paul Barry as Pep *Alison Fraser as Marianne *Allen Garfield as Jack *Paul Hecht as Tom *Marlon Hoffman as Driver *Judy Reyes as Rosie *Jeremy Roberts as Paul *Sam Rockwell as Louie *Barry Snider as Sheriff Wylie ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1992 films Category:American films Category:American comedy films Category:1992 comedy films
title: Jack and His Friends
